content: भार्गवः [भृगोरपत्यं अण्] {@--1@} <ab>N.</ab> of Śukra, regent of the planet Venus and preceptor of the Asuras. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of Paraśurāma; see परशुराम. {@--3@} An epithet of Śiva. {@--4@} An archer. {@--5@} An elephant. {@--6@} An epithet of Jamadagni. {@--7@} Of Mārkaṇḍeya. {@--8@} <ab>N.</ab> of an eastern country.
